UniprotID	Q99536
Accession	Q99536;A8K345;B0AZP7;B4DPX4;Q13035;Q5BKZ7;Q96A39;Q9BUT8
EntryName	VAT1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Synaptic vesicle membrane protein VAT-1 homolog (EC 1.-.-.-)
GeneName	VAT1
Length	393
Function	Possesses ATPase activity (By similarity). Plays a part in calcium-regulated keratinocyte activation in epidermal repair mechanisms. Has no effect on cell proliferation. Negatively regulates mitochondrial fusion in cooperation with mitofusin proteins (MFN1-2).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Mitochondrion outer membrane
